history.proof: hauto lq: on use: Zeven_sqr1, prop2, rel_prime_sym, Zodd_sqr1, prop1, Zeven_not_Zodd unfold: distinct_parity.

original: simpl. intros. apply rel_prime_mod_rev. - apply Z.lt_le_incl. apply H0. - apply rel_prime_div with p. + apply H1. + apply Zdivide_intro with q. * ring_simplify. reflexivity. - apply distp_sqr2. apply distp_sqr1. apply H2. - apply Zge_trans with 0. + apply Z.le_trans with p. * apply Z.lt_le_incl. apply H. * apply Z.le_trans with q. ++ apply Z.add_le_mono. ** apply Z.mul_nonneg_nonneg; lia. ** apply Z.mul_nonneg_nonneg; lia. ++ lia. + apply Z.mul_le_mono_nonneg. * apply Z.le_refl. * lia. * apply Z.le_0_1. * apply Z.le_0_1.
